description: Basic rules for employee conduct on social media platforms

rules.description: Sharing confidential company information including unreleased products, financial data, or internal communications
Posts that damage company reputation, including negative comments about the company, its products, or leadership
Harassment, bullying, or unprofessional comments about colleagues, customers, or partners
Use of inappropriate language, profanity, or unprofessional tone that reflects poorly on employment status
Discriminatory comments related to race, gender, religion, sexual orientation, age, or disability
